title: One Night with You
description: Cass Jones had no time to waste on a personal life. She is determined to make a success of her plus size clothing line regardless of the odds. When by misadventure she meets the sexiest Cypriot alive, she succumbs to her deepest fantasy. Not even her fantasy does justice to the reality of the hard bodied Andreas Katsakis who makes her explode and then some.In true Cinderellaesque fashion she flees leaving a signature design piece behind. Virtually an unknown designer, Andreas’ attempts to locate the missing half of his soul end in frustration. With a bit of ‘Fairy Godmother’ style manipulation, his three sisters bring the lovers back together. However getting the happily ever after he desires is doomed to failure until Andreas convinces Cass he will love her far longer than only one night.
author: Toni Dare
